action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Mr. Ciscomani) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to waive the accrual of interest and payments for certain disaster loans for a year, and for other purposes.

section.header: Waiver of interest accrual and payments for certain disaster loans
section.text: Section 7(d) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(d)) is amended by adding at the end the following paragraph:

paragraph.header: Waiver of interest accrual and payments
paragraph.text: With respect to a loan made under subsection (b) for disasters declared on or after the date of the enactment of this paragraph, the Administrator shall, for the 12-month period beginning on the date of disbursement of such loanâ€”

subparagraph.text: establish a rate of interest on such loan of zero percent; and
defer payments during such period on the principal of such loan.
